title: Unfair and unreasonable match-making
body: I just got matched against people like 8 and 9 levels ahead of me so what i want to know is why the hell is that fair i had no chance to win so if this game is supposed to be fun and enjoyable how about fixing this problem, cuz its ruining  your game

replies.body:
In all honesty, everything will seem "unfair" and "unreasonable" until you have ~300 wins and you've experienced ranked. I know it's a massive cop-out but for an experienced player, 8/9 summoner levels is nothing. It's the equivalent to a  maximum ~600 gold deficit at starting, and you're playing at a level where players don't understand how to maximise (or even use) that advantage.

In terms of fixing the problem, the system is matching you with the closest players possible. It's literally them or nothing, as the vast majority of active players are level 30.
Where did you hear that the game was "fun and enjoyable"? You sure it wasn't a marketing gimmick?
